title: The Exchange: Jim Rogers
description:
The longtime Asia bull and Quantum Fund co-founder thinks the worst bear market of his lifetime is coming. He swung by our Hong Kong bureau to discuss the risks, as well as Trump’s Asia tour and why America could become its own worst enemy if it lets China dominate the region. See acast.com/privacy for privacy and opt-out information.
